name: The Stardust Arena Trials
shortDescription: an action-packed, uplifting story about a cosmic arena where the user faces thrilling trials to prove their skill and courage.

scenes.description: The user stands in a glowing arena floating in space, surrounded by cheering cosmic beings. This scene introduces the arena, the crowd and the idea that the user is the main challenger.

llmHints.general: Introduce a high-energy but friendly cosmic tournament. Make it clear the user is in the spotlight, but keep the tone encouraging rather than stressful.
llmHints.happy: Lean into the joy and excitement of being cheered for. Make the arena feel like a fun celebration.
llmHints.sad: Use the brightness and friendliness of the crowd to gently lift the user's mood without forcing it.
llmHints.angry: Give the user a sense that their strong energy can be turned into something bold and constructive here.
llmHints.disgust: Highlight the clarity, order and clean starlight of the arena so it feels pure and sharp, not messy.
llmHints.fear: Emphasize that the arena and its spirits are on the user's side. Focus on guidance, safety and support.
llmHints.surprised: Play up the wonder of suddenly becoming the center of a cosmic event, in a positive wow way.
llmHints.neutral: Describe the visual details of the arena calmly: lights, banners, shapes of the stands, hum of energy.

scenes.description: A track of floating platforms appears in front of the user, glowing with shifting starlight. This scene focuses on fast movement, jumping or running from platform to platform.

llmHints.general: Describe motion, rhythm and the feeling of moving through starlight. Make it feel dynamic but not dangerous.
llmHints.happy: Make the trial feel like a joyful game where each jump is fun and rewarding.
llmHints.sad: Focus on small personal victories with each successful jump. The cheers gently encourage the user.
llmHints.angry: Show how the user can channel intense energy into focused, powerful movement along the track.
llmHints.disgust: Emphasize the clean, sharp lines of the platforms and the clear, crisp starlit air.
llmHints.fear: Mention visible safe paths or guiding lights. Reassure that the user can move at a comfortable pace and still succeed.
llmHints.surprised: Highlight how quickly the user adapts and how cool it feels to move in sync with the starlight.
llmHints.neutral: Describe the pattern of the platforms, how they respond underfoot and the steady progress forward.

options.text: Make one final leap to the finish ring.
Slow down and enjoy the view before finishing.

scenes.description: A cluster of glowing symbols spins slowly in the air. The user has to observe patterns, test combinations and solve a puzzle to advance.

llmHints.general: Focus on thinking, curiosity and pattern recognition. The challenge is mental rather than physical.
llmHints.happy: Frame the puzzle as a fun brain game, with each click or correct guess giving a small burst of satisfaction.
llmHints.sad: Make the clear rules and steady ticking of the symbols feel comforting and predictable.
llmHints.angry: Show how the user can pour sharp focus into analyzing the puzzle, turning frustration into determination.
llmHints.disgust: Emphasize the elegant, ordered design of the puzzle, contrasting with anything messy or chaotic.
llmHints.fear: Include a gentle guide voice or hint-giving spirit, reminding the user that they are not alone and can ask for help.
llmHints.surprised: Highlight small moments of discovery and the pleasant surprise when patterns start to make sense.
llmHints.neutral: Describe the calm process of testing combinations and watching how the symbols respond.

options.text: Place the last symbol into the center.
Ask the arena spirit for one more hint.

scenes.description: Time seems to slow and the user can see the whole galaxy spread out around them from the arena. This is a reflective, panoramic moment between trials and the ending.

llmHints.general: Shift into a slower, more reflective pace. Focus on the beauty and scale of the galaxy.
llmHints.happy: Treat the view as a joyful reward, a celebratory panorama that matches the user's bright mood.
llmHints.sad: Use the scale of the stars to gently make problems feel smaller and life feel a bit more spacious.
llmHints.angry: Let the vastness of space soften the sharpness of anger, creating room for calmer thoughts.
llmHints.disgust: Describe the galaxy as clean, balanced and harmonious, free of clutter or mess.
llmHints.fear: Make the many lights feel like distant friends. Emphasize that the user is safely held in the arena.
llmHints.surprised: Highlight the unexpected depth and beauty of the view and the realization of how far the user has come.
llmHints.neutral: Describe the slow motion of planets, comets and stars in a calm, observational way.

options.text: Return to the arena floor to hear the results.

scenes.description: The user returns to the center of the arena. The crowd gathers and a beam of light crowns the user with stardust, marking the completion of the trials.

llmHints.general: This is the resolution. Summarize the sense of achievement and close the experience with warmth and clarity.
llmHints.happy: Lean into triumphant, celebratory language without making it too long.
llmHints.sad: Acknowledge that things may still be hard, but highlight a clear moment of pride and recognition.
llmHints.angry: Show the user standing steady and strong, having turned their energy into skill and control.
llmHints.disgust: Keep the ceremony pure and simple: the user tried, adapted and is now honored for that effort.
llmHints.fear: Reveal that the trials were always meant to support and reveal the user's capability, not to judge harshly.
llmHints.surprised: Highlight how natural it now feels to wear the stardust crown, as if the user belonged here all along.
llmHints.neutral: Describe the ceremony in a calm, straightforward way, noting the light, warmth and closure.
